reviewText: Not as in depth as I'd like and only covers one aspect with paired drill between dragon staff and butterfly swords. Still worth the purchase and the viewing g.

This is a good video to watch in tandem with the book of the same title.  It makes the moves a lot clearer.  The problem is, you need the book to be able to get an idea as to how to do the moves yourself, as there are no actual verbal instructions on the DVD.  So, if you want to learn this form, buy both the book and the DVD.
